issue.title: [CF 338] BigWigs integration
issue.body:
icon types and/or conditions

at least look into it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #338 | Raw

comments.body:
This has been sitting here for so long and I really don't see much of a point to it anymore. I just thought it would be a cool thing to implement when I am sitting around bored with nothing to do, but that seems to never happen anymore, and so unfortunately for this idea, it hasn't made the cut.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
